title: Animated Abstract Watch Face
summary: Beautiful Animations based on Abstract theme for your Smart Watch
description: Experience huge collection of beautiful animations on your smartwatch. The unique features of the app are:- All animations absolutely "Free".- Analog and Digital Dials- Option to choose from High Quality or Standard Quality Animated videos. Standard quality takes less than 30 seconds to load the animation on watch and High quality takes less than 90 seconds.- Digital dial text direction: Top, Center, Bottom- Over 20 Digital fonts availableNote : Only supports Android Wear Watches.(Watches like Samsung Gear, DZ09 ,Sony smartwatch are not supported)
descriptionHTML:
Experience huge collection of beautiful animations on your smartwatch.

The unique features of the app are:

- All animations absolutely "Free".
- Analog and Digital Dials
- Option to choose from High Quality or Standard Quality Animated videos. Standard quality takes less than 30 seconds to load the animation on watch and High quality takes less than 90 seconds.
- Digital dial text direction: Top, Center, Bottom
- Over 20 Digital fonts available


Note : Only supports Android Wear Watches.
(Watches like Samsung Gear, DZ09 ,Sony smartwatch are not supported)
